constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 13 (Thursday, January 20, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. MILLER of Illinois:
H.R. 6457.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8
[Page H290]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: To prohibit the provision of Federal funds to a local educational agency unless in-person instruction is available to all students at the schools served by the agency.
